actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide authorization for a United States contribution to the International Atomic Energy Agency in support of its safeguards activities.
short_title: International Atomic Energy Agency Safeguards Activities Act

summary.text: International Atomic Energy Agency Safeguards Activities Act - Authorizes the appropriation of $5,000,000 for additional contribution by the United States to the International Atomic Energy Agency for its Safeguards activities.

titles.title: International Atomic Energy Agency Safeguards Activities Act
A bill to provide authorization for a United States contribution to the International Atomic Energy Agency in support of its safeguards activities.
